system.effect:
Creates X Metre diameter Smoke Screen that lasts 1d10+10 Rounds or less in adverse weather conditions. Smoke hampers vision.
If no X Value, Default to Smokescreen of 3d10 metre diameter for 2d10 Rounds, may be effected by bad weather

description.value: Creates X Metre diameter Smoke Screen that lasts 1d10+10 Rounds or less in adverse weather conditions. Smoke hampers vision. If no X Value, Default to Smokescreen of 3d10 metre diameter for 2d10 Rounds, may be effected by bad weather
